com.learn.android.demos.toast

类 Style.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.learn.android.demos.toast.Style.Builder
  • 封闭类:
    Style

    public static class Style.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for the Style object.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Style.Builder()
      Creates a Style.Builder to build a Style upon.
      Style.Builder(Style baseStyle)
      Creates a Style.Builder to build a Style upon.

      • Style.Builder

        public Style.Builder()
        Creates a Style.Builder to build a Style upon.

      • Style.Builder

        public Style.Builder(Style baseStyle)
        Creates a Style.Builder to build a Style upon.
        参数:
        baseStyle - The base Style to use for this Style.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setConfiguration

        public Style.Builder setConfiguration(Configuration configuration)
        Set the Configuration option of the Crouton.
        参数:
        configuration - The Configuration.
        返回:
        the Style.Builder.

      • setBackgroundColor

        public Style.Builder setBackgroundColor(int backgroundColorResourceId)
        Set the backgroundColorResourceId option of the Crouton.
        参数:
        backgroundColorResourceId - The backgroundColorResourceId's resource id.
        返回:
        the Style.Builder.

      • setBackgroundColorValue

        public Style.Builder setBackgroundColorValue(int backgroundColorValue)
        Set the backgroundColorResourceValue option of the Crouton.
        参数:
        backgroundColorValue - The backgroundColorResourceValue's e.g. 0xffff4444;
        返回:
        the Style.Builder.

      • setBackgroundDrawable

        public Style.Builder setBackgroundDrawable(int backgroundDrawableResourceId)
        Set the backgroundDrawableResourceId option for the Crouton.
        参数:
        backgroundDrawableResourceId - Resource ID of a backgroundDrawableResourceId image drawable.
        返回:
        the Style.Builder.

      • setHeight

        public Style.Builder setHeight(int height)
        Set the heightInPixels option for the Crouton.
        参数:
        height - The height of the Crouton in pixel. Can also be LayoutParams#MATCH_PARENT or LayoutParams#WRAP_CONTENT.
        返回:
        the Style.Builder.

      • setHeightDimensionResId

        public Style.Builder setHeightDimensionResId(int heightDimensionResId)
        Set the resource id for the height option for the Crouton.
        参数:
        heightDimensionResId - Resource ID of a dimension for the height of the Crouton.
        返回:
        the Style.Builder.

      • setWidth

        public Style.Builder setWidth(int width)
        Set the widthInPixels option for the Crouton.
        参数:
        width - The width of the Crouton in pixel. Can also be LayoutParams#MATCH_PARENT or LayoutParams#WRAP_CONTENT.
        返回:
        the Style.Builder.

      • setWidthDimensionResId

        public Style.Builder setWidthDimensionResId(int widthDimensionResId)
        Set the resource id for the width option for the Crouton.
        参数:
        widthDimensionResId - Resource ID of a dimension for the width of the Crouton.
        返回:
        the Style.Builder.

      • setTileEnabled

        public Style.Builder setTileEnabled(boolean isTileEnabled)
        Set the isTileEnabled option for the Crouton.
        参数:
        isTileEnabled - true if you want the backgroundResourceId to be tiled, else false.
        返回:
        the Style.Builder.

      • setTextColor

        public Style.Builder setTextColor(int textColor)
        Set the textColorResourceId option for the Crouton.
        参数:
        textColor - The resource id of the text colorResourceId.
        返回:
        the Style.Builder.

      • setTextColorValue

        public Style.Builder setTextColorValue(int textColorValue)
        Set the textColorResourceValue option of the Crouton.
        参数:
        textColorValue - The textColorResourceValue's e.g. 0xffff4444;
        返回:
        the Style.Builder.

      • setGravity

        public Style.Builder setGravity(int gravity)
        Set the gravity option for the Crouton.
        参数:
        gravity - The text's gravity as provided by Gravity.
        返回:
        the Style.Builder.

      • setImageDrawable

        public Style.Builder setImageDrawable(Drawable imageDrawable)
        Set the image option for the Crouton.
        参数:
        imageDrawable - An additional image to display in the Crouton.
        返回:
        the Style.Builder.

      • setImageResource

        public Style.Builder setImageResource(int imageResId)
        Set the image resource option for the Crouton.
        参数:
        imageResId - An additional image to display in the Crouton.
        返回:
        the Style.Builder.
